                    col_types = 
                      cols(.row_id = "i",
                           prefecture = "c",

    ã“ã“ã§ä½œã‚‹å›³ã¯ã€åˆæœŸãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã‚’æ§‹ç¯‰ã™ã‚‹å‰æ®µéšã§ç¤ºå”†ã‚’æä¾›ã™ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã¨æœ›ã¾ã—ã„ã§ã™ã€‚

    gg_count_var <- function(data, var) {
  var <- rlang::enquo(var)
  var_label <- rlang::quo_name(var)
  data %>% 
    count(!!var) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(forcats::fct_reorder(!!var, n), n)) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
    labs(x = var_label) +
    coord_flip()
}

    df_is_cat %>%
